description:
Light enough for backpacking, large enough for a basecamp stove, and Teflon coated for easy clean-up. The square shape maximizes the space used on propane camp stoves, and is ideal for making the perfect pancake sandwich.

  • Anodized aluminum exterior is highly conductive for quick and even heating
  • Teflon™ non-stick coating makes clean-up easy and reduces the need for fat and oil
  • SureLock™ folding handle with rubber coating provides a sturdy grip, and locks in place
  • Use with plastic, silicone or wooden utensils to avoid scratching the coating
name: GSI Bugaboo 10" Square Frypan
